level.heading: Adoption of acts to carry out subpart.
level.text: The Council of the District of Columbia shall adopt such acts as are necessary to carry out the purpose of this subpart within 180 days of the effective date of this subpart. Neither a petition initiating an initiative nor a referendum may be presented to the District of Columbia Board of Elections and Ethics prior to October 1, 1978.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-46, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-204.101.
